name: CocoRally Ultimate
description:
New Generation Of Cocoanix Thanks To CocoEngine!

(CocoEngine Is A Set Of Plugins For Unity)

Experience Driving Like Never Before, Now For Free! Ride On Beautiful Maps From Previous Games Such As: CocoRally Drive, CocoRally Pocket Or CocoRally 3D(Xbox 360 And PS3), Now In Amazing Quality! The Newly Added Online Mode Is A Revolution For CocoRally. Game Is Insanely Fun With Friends! So We Ported The Game To Various Plattforms: Xbox One/SeriesS/X, Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, iOS And Finally Web Browser.

Game Is In Late-Development. I'm At Porting Stage!

Notes For iOS Build: Use AltStore To Install The .ipa File. Minimum Requirements Are: iPhone 6S Or Later / iPad Air 2 Or Later. Tested On: iPhone 6, iPhone 6S, iPhone SE, iPhone 13 Pro Max And iPad Air 2
